## Steps to reproduce

I can't run the following Python code in Powershell ISE.
```
import getpass

password = getpass.getpass("Input password:")
print(password)
```

It hangs forever.

Original issue:
https://github.com/Azure/azure-cli/issues/15183

## Expected behavior
It should prompt to input password.

## Actual behavior
It hangs forever.

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: The ISE is locked to PS 5.1 and is no longer being developed. It also has a highly customized console API that is known to cause some issues from time to time, it's designed with PowerShell in mind and the console API is nonstandard, so it's not entirely surprising that Python would run into issues trying to interact with it in a way it might interact with a standard console host.

title: Powershell ISE hangs when I try to input password
